BlogPost.title: BlogPost
BlogPost.description: Represents a blog post in the CMS.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blog post.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

content.description: The content of the blog post.

authorId.description: Reference to the Author. (Relationship: Author 1:N BlogPost)

isPublished.description: Indicates whether the blog post is published.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the blog post was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the blog post was last updated.

Author.title: Author
Author.description: Represents the author of a blog post.

email.description: The email address of the author.

/blog_posts/{blogPostId}.description: Collection of blog posts. The 'authorId' field must match the authenticated user's UID for write access. Read access is public.
